entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Convert to generated regex fixer is disabled on regex parse errors hit during counting captures #80004
  • NativeAOT did not produce code for contstructor #80002
  • Document System.Net.Quic prerequisites and supported OSes #80001
  • [API Proposal]: Add Task.Run overload that avoids capturing the ExecutionContext #80000
  • [API Proposal]: ConfigurationBinder should have a Get method that returns non nullable T when record type is used #79999
    Future
  • mscordbi.dll 4.700.22.55902 is missing from symbol servers. #79996
    8.0.0
  • SemaphoreSlim constructor parameter doc #79995
  • [wasm][globalization][icu] Prepare basis for `HybridGlobalization` #79992
    8.0.0
  • [wasm][globalization][icu] Tracking issue for HybridGlobalization: Web API + ICU #79989
    8.0.0
  • [wasm][icu] Allow basic ICU sharding in WASM app like Blazor does it + custom files #79987
    8.0.0
  • libraries-jitstress-random assert failed (igInLoop->igLoopBackEdge == nullptr) || (igInLoop->igLoopBackEdge == igLoopHeader) #79986
    8.0.0
  • vs2022 17.5.0 preview2.0 failed to load the old project #79984

Closed

  • RuntimeHelpers.CreateSpan support is failing in some circumstances #79477
    8.0.0
  • Test failure JIT\\Regression\\JitBlue\\Runtime_45557\\Runtime_45557\\Runtime_45557.cmd #79518
    8.0.0
  • [Jit][Intrinsics] Local variables mixed up #79399
  • Access Violation assigning ref readonly field #78268
  • TaskWebClientTest.UploadValues_Success test is failing #79731
    8.0.0
  • Crash in ThrowHelper.ThrowJsonReaderException #77898
  • [wasm][debugger] Improve some regex patterns in `MonoSDBHelper.cs` #78979
    8.0.0
  • Prepare `icudt_wasm.dat` and corresponding sharded datafiles without `collations/standard`, enable setting `HybridGlobalization` and write WBT checking if the new file got loaded instead of the old one #79991
  • [wasm][icu] Canonical locales are not in filters but users would like to use them #79816
    8.0.0
  • RyuJIT drops unused volatile reads. #6280
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/6.0] CreateDump: Only add pages with committed memory #80005
    Servicing-consider, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • Remove framework libraries from ILC package #80003
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Respect SETTINGS_MAX_HEADER_LIST_SIZE on HTTP/2 #79997
    area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.x
  • [release/7.0] Respect SETTINGS_MAX_HEADER_LIST_SIZE on HTTP/2 and HTTP/3 #79994
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.x
  • Report FOH segments #79985
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] createdump: only dump committed memory #79983
    Servicing-consider, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 7.0.x

Merged

  • Sync ILLink to latest dotnet/linker commits #79918
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Handle `LCL_FLD_ADDR` in TreeLifeUpdater #79913
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add executable bit to tizen sh files #79998
    community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Modified regexes used for group-match. #79988
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Respect SETTINGS_MAX_HEADER_LIST_SIZE on HTTP/2 and HTTP/3 #79281
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • Fix WebClient url encoding regression #79975
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0

Updated

  • delete enum support for bool as an underlying type #79962
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Add support for JsonUnmappedMemberHandling #79945
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Fix CPU_COUNT check for FreeBSD 13.1+ #77867
    os-freebsd, area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • Fix HTTP3 header decoder buffer allocation #78862
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Trying to fix firefox flaky tests on CI. #75090
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Replace successive "ldr" and "str" instructions with "ldp" and "stp" #77540
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Emit mneg for mul+neg on Arm64 #79550
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix the ARM's `double` register name displayed in JitDisasm/JitDump #79949
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Introduce OptLevel() in jit #77465
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Reuse handles inside a loop in reflection_create_dynamic_metho… #79716
    area-System.Reflection-mono
  • [release/7.0] Fix ALC lookup from the DAC #78420
    Servicing-approved, area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, 7.0.3
